name: HibernateEcho
short_description:
HibernateEcho provides a layer between Hibernate and Echo/Echopoint by the creation of Hibernate-aware Echo/Echopoint widgets. It greatly reduces the time of developing web based forms and tables.
Technologies: java, hibernate, echo, echopoint, jxl
